system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision Environment. GTK implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "environment, global, system" date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_environment_imp.xmlEV_ENVIRONMENT_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_environment_i.xmlEV_ENVIRONMENT_I export {FalseANY} ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed end
FalseEXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_environment_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_environment_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_interface/ev_environment_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Pass an_interface to base make. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_environment_imp.xml#f_makemake -- No initialization needed. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_initializedset_is_initialized (True) end
feature -- Access
f_supported_image_formats../implementation_gtk/ev_environment_imp.xml#f_supported_image_formatsSupported_image_formats: FalseLINEAR [FalseSTRING_32] -- Result contains all supported image formats -- on current platform, in the form of their three letter extension. -- e.g. PNG, BMP, ICO local app_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_application_imp.xmlEV_APPLICATION_IMP once app_imp ?= (create {../interface/ev_environment.xmlEV_ENVIRONMENT}).../interface/ev_environment.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_environment_i.xml#f_application_iapplication_i check app_imp /= Void then end Result := app_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_environment.xml#f_readable_pixbuf_formatsReadable_pixbuf_formats.Falselinear_representation Result.Falsecompare_objects end
f_mouse_wheel_scroll_lines../implementation_gtk/ev_environment_imp.xml#f_mouse_wheel_scroll_linesmouse_wheel_scroll_lines: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Default number of lines to scroll in response to -- a mouse wheel scroll event. do Result := 3 end
f_default_pointer_style_width../implementation_gtk/ev_environment_imp.xml#f_default_pointer_style_widthdefault_pointer_style_width: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Default pointer style width. do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gdk_display_get_default_cursor_sizegdk_display_get_default_cursor_size ({../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gdk_display_get_defaultgdk_display_get_default) end
f_default_pointer_style_height../implementation_gtk/ev_environment_imp.xml#f_default_pointer_style_heightdefault_pointer_style_height: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Default pointer style height. do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gdk_display_get_default_cursor_sizegdk_display_get_default_cursor_size ({../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gdk_display_get_defaultgdk_display_get_default) end
f_has_printer../implementation_gtk/ev_environment_imp.xml#f_has_printerhas_printer: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is a default printer available? -- Result is True if at least one printer is installed. do Falsesystem ("which lpr > /dev/null 2>&1") Result := Falsereturn_code = 0 end
f_font_families../implementation_gtk/ev_environment_imp.xml#f_font_familiesFont_families: FalseLINEAR [FalseSTRING_32] -- List of fonts available on the system local app_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_application_imp.xmlEV_APPLICATION_IMP once app_imp ?= (create {../interface/ev_environment.xmlEV_ENVIRONMENT}).../interface/ev_environment.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_environment_i.xml#f_application_iapplication_i check app_imp /= Void then end Result := app_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_dependent_application_imp.xml#f_font_names_on_systemFont_names_on_system.Falselinear_representation Result.Falsecompare_objects end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2017, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_environment_imp.xmlEV_ENVIRONMENT_IMP
